---------------------------------------------------------------------------Season of The Lost (S15)---------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Jurassic Green
//notes: (PvE): This just edges out Gridskipper for PvE since it can roll at least one solid column three PVE perk i.e. Subsistence. Frenzy or Dragonfly in column four. Masterwork: Handling or Range

dimwishlist:item=-2261046232
